text:
@realDonaldTrump Covid-19 is hitting close to home at the White House, where two staffers with access to Trump and Pence have tested positive in the last two days !!!!!!! 
The virus is closing in on you with no mask!!!
Time to get your Clorox syringe ready !!!!!
hahahahahahahahaaha!!!!!!!! https://t.co/b1Y90twECN
